text:
The Paavoorchathram police are on the lookout for a youth and his associates as they abducted a 26-year-old woman from her house on Wednesday night.

Police said Jension (26) of Shanthi Nagar in Palayamkottai was in love with a classmate when he was pursuing his graduation in a college at Nanguneri a few years ago. When he proposed to her, the girl refused. However, Jension, even after completing the course, continued to harass the girl’s family members over phone that he wanted to marry her, but his pleas were turned down.

Against this backdrop, Jenison and his associates went to the girl’s house in a car and abducted her after attacking her mother and a few relatives when they tried to prevent them. Paavoorchathram police have registered a case.
title: Youth, friends abduct woman
